title: tAyinaik-kANAda
sahitya:
tAyinaik-kANAda shEyinaip-pOlavE shAmbit-taLarndE tEmbuginrEnE 
siddhi shivakAmiyE sarva lOkangaLum dayaiyinAl inraLitta tani mudal vAzhvE


anupallavi

  pAi punar gangai panimati punai Ishan pArttamarndE irukkap-parivinAl aNDangaL 
Ai iniduruLavE ADiDum dEviyE ambikaiyE umaiyE Ananda alaiyE


caraNam    vAniDamenguum vaLarndiDum jyOtiyE variyanEn tuyarAl vADudal ariyAyO 
hInargaLAyinum Inravan taLLIDAL enbadum ninpAl illaiyO shollAi 
aruL nirai vAridhitE aDiyanuk-koru tuLi aLippadanAl aduvum aDivaraNDiDumO 
maruL nirai vAzhvinil mayangi-yazhandEn vandaNaippAyE mAyi mAdEviyE
